title: [Large-Scale] Storytelling-Based VR Simulation Education for Scientific Problem-Solving

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic theories and research methodologies in the field of science
context.additional_context: Reconstructing real-world scientific problem situations in workplaces—such as lab safety cases, research data interpretation, and scientific paper writing—into narrative structures

learning_goals: Learners can structure and explain the scientific problem-solving process in a VR simulation environment using a narrative framework (introduction-development-crisis-climax-resolution).
Learners can analyze and interpret complex experimental data using storytelling scenarios based on real scientific research cases.
Learners can present science problem-solving solutions applying a narrative structure with over 80% accuracy in summative assessments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
